title: Poster, ca. 1965
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: lower right at edge: Entwurf und Photo: Manfried Maier USG Basel     Druck: Wassermann AG
description: A stop-action black and white photographic image of a policemens on a speeding motorcycle. The image is tilted to the right and fills the sheet.  Printed across the image in dark gray and "caution yellow" Die POLIZEN [this on the front  of the motorcycle] HILFT / SIE SUCHT / POLIZET - REKRUTEN.  And at lower left in gray: AMMELDUNG / POLIZEIDEPARTEMENT / BASELSTADT

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1965.
ca. 1965. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-193.
